$ul: **business_booking_profile**:
**allow_user_cancel**: Indicates whether customers can cancel or reschedule their own bookings (`true`) or not (`false`).
**booking_enabled**: Indicates whether the seller is open for booking.
**booking_policy**: The policy for the seller to automatically accept booking requests (`ACCEPT_ALL`) or not (`REQUIRES_ACCEPTANCE`).
**business_appointment_settings**: The service appointment settings, including where and how the service is provided.
**alignment_time**: The time unit of the service duration for bookings.
**any_team_member_booking_enabled**: Indicates whether a customer can choose from all available time slots and have a staff member assigned
**cancellation_fee_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency
**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**cancellation_policy**: The cancellation policy adopted by the seller.
**cancellation_policy_text**: The free-form text of the seller's cancellation policy.
**cancellation_window_seconds**: The cut-off time in seconds for allowing clients to cancel or reschedule an appointment.
**location_types**: Types of the location allowed for bookings.
**max_appointments_per_day_limit**: The maximum number of daily appointments per team member or per location.
**max_appointments_per_day_limit_type**: Indicates whether the daily appointment limit applies to team members or to
**max_booking_lead_time_seconds**: The maximum lead time in seconds before a service can be booked. Bookings must be created at most this far ahead of the booking's starting time.
**min_booking_lead_time_seconds**: The minimum lead time in seconds before a service can be booked. Bookings must be created at least this far ahead of the booking's starting time.
**multiple_service_booking_enabled**: Indicates whether a customer can book multiple services in a single online booking.
**skip_booking_flow_staff_selection**: Indicates whether customers has an assigned staff member (`true`) or can select s staff member of their choice (`false`).
**created_at**: The RFC 3339 timestamp specifying the booking's creation time.
**customer_timezone_choice**: The choice of customer's time zone information of a booking.
**seller_id**: The ID of the seller, obtainable using the Merchants API.
**errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
